assumptions: Chart adapted to t=const foliation; Eulerian normal defined by lapse/shift; g(n,n)=-1; units G=c=1.
runtime_signal: alpha, beta^i, gamma_ij (ADM fields consumed by GR solver / constraint gate)
derivation_notes: Eq. (1) defines how (alpha,beta,gamma) appear in ds^2; no repo-implementation claim.
falsifier: Reconstruct g_{mu nu} from runtime (alpha,beta,gamma); if it does not reproduce Eq. (1) in the declared chart, ADM extraction is wrong.

assumptions: Same chart/observer/units as Eq. (1); D_i is gamma-compatible covariant derivative.
derivation_notes: Eq. (9) defines K_ij from (alpha,beta,gamma, d_t gamma).
falsifier: On a test case with known d_t gamma_ij, if runtime K_ij differs from Eq. (9) beyond numerical tolerance, mapping fails.

assumptions: Sigma_t foliation; Eulerian n; g(n,n)=-1; geometric units with explicit 8pi factors.
derivation_notes: Defines Hamiltonian-constraint violation H from (3)R, K, K_ij K^ij, and E=T(n,n).
falsifier: Minkowski data must yield H=0; if H_residual != 0, mapping fails.

assumptions: Same foliation/observer; D_i gamma-compatible; p_i matter momentum projection.
derivation_notes: Defines momentum-constraint violation M_i = D_j K^j_i - D_i K - 8pi p_i.
falsifier: Vacuum K_ij=0 and p_i=0 must yield M_i=0.

assumptions: M=R^4, standard (t,x^i); n_a=-dt, n^a=partial_t + X; X bounded smooth.
runtime_signal: beta (Natario shift in Needle Hull geometry section)
derivation_notes: Natario defines metric via X; mapping beta to X is within-metric identification.
falsifier: If runtime beta cannot be associated with any X such that ds^2 matches Def. 1.1, mapping fails.

assumptions: Same chart; theta = div X.
derivation_notes: Natario expansion requires spatial derivatives; if ThetaAudit not computed from div X (or -Tr K), no geometry-derived chain.
falsifier: Compute div X (or D_i beta^i); if it does not match ThetaAudit up to sign/units, mapping fails.

assumptions: Eulerian observer; uses (3)R, trK, K_ij K^ij; flat-slice sets (3)R=0.
derivation_notes: Natario rho is derived forward from geometry; pipeline T00 is proxy-only.
falsifier: Compute rho from runtime (alpha,beta,gamma) via Thm. 1.7; if it disagrees with T00_avg, mapping fails.

assumptions: Units c=G=hbar=1; constant v; conformal factor B(r_s).
derivation_notes: B(r) is functional; no single gammaVdB scalar in Eq. (4).
falsifier: Implement B(r) and compare observables sensitive to B' and B''; scalar-only model fails.

assumptions: Region II; orthonormal basis Eq. (10); T^{hat0hat0} depends on B', B'', (1/r) B'.
derivation_notes: Scalar-only band cannot encode derivative structure.
falsifier: Vary B'(r), B''(r) with scalar factor fixed; if energy density does not respond, mapping fails.

assumptions: QI-derived thickness scaling; depends on v_s and L_P.
derivation_notes: Needle Hull uses macroscopic wall thickness; no explicit tie to Eq. (17).
falsifier: Insert runtime wall thickness into Eq. (17); if violated, mapping fails.

assumptions: Lorentzian-smeared energy density in flat 4D; inertial timelike observer.
derivation_notes: Without explicit runtime hat{rho} calculation, zeta is proxy-only.
falsifier: Compute hat{rho} and compare derived zeta to runtime zeta.

assumptions: Lorentzian sampling kernel with width t0; defines hat{rho} by time average.
derivation_notes: If runtime sampling time does not enter via kernel, mapping is proxy-only.
falsifier: Change t0; if margin does not scale in t0^-4 direction, mapping fails.

falsifier: If runtime modulation frequency differs from cited GHz regime, mapping fails.
